title: Sir GoldenStern
author: Sir GoldenStern
created_time: August 23, 2023, 04:57:19 PMLast edit: November 13, 2023, 09:10:39 PM by Sir GoldenStern
content: 🚀 Hey there, bitcointalkers! Excited to share something mind-blowing with you! 🌟I'm Anton GoldenStern, your digital-artist and math wizard extraordinaire. 🎨🔮 Let's dive into the awesomeness I've been brewing up!🔥 Introducing my study on a revolutionary utopian/communistic economy intertwined with crypto. 🌍💰 It's not just a concept, it's a thrilling crypto-game that's about to blow your mind! 🎮🚀📜 StoryPicture this: 25 years ago, a triangle-shaped flying machine appeared in the Russian outback, sparking a journey that changed everything. 🛸🏞️ Fast forward to today, where I've merged Soviet paramedicine research with shamanic arts to reconstruct a society that survived a global catastrophe 200 years ago. 📚🔮The heart of this lost society, a sunken utopia, lies in its unique resource distribution model. 💎🔄 And guess what? With years of dedication and some mystical practices, my associates and I translated this into math! 🧙‍♂️🔢Two years back, I dared to fuse this formula into a blockchain-powered project. Say hello to ANGL.APP, your gateway to a pocket metaverse where utopian ideals come to life! 🌌💼🚀📚🔍 Study ValueI've spent the last couple of years building the core of this utopian model in a mobile app, which doubles as a crypto wallet (BNB for now, ETH soon, and more!). 📱💰 And there's more – within lies a gDAO pocket chatroom world, a realm where Master Masons unite! 🌐💬Imagine a realm where crypto-funds transform into E-Idols, growing in an alternate dimension. 🌟💰 The hive mind relentlessly balances their value every Aeon (that's every 10 minutes, folks!). ⏳🐝 Let's gently bridge this utopian masterpiece with our reality – no wars, no revolutions needed. 🕊️💎🚀🧬 Pioneering InnovationPeek into my vision: AnglVerse evolving into its own 3-layered blockchain, DNA-structured, governed by cube-satellites, with users holding the nodes. The future is now, and we're paving the way for it. 🌌🚀🌍📊📊 TokenomicsGet ready for Angl Shards – the heart of AnglVerse – hitting the market through two fascinating channels:AnglVerse Green Mining Consensus 🌱💰Witness ANGLS tokens sprouting every 10 mins through the electrifying Quantum Oracle dynamic staking mechanics. The 10% annual growth is just the beginning – events might shake things up! 🎮🔄GoldenStern Central Bank & gDAO Consensus 🏦🗳️Peek into the heart of the AnglVerse economy with limited ANGLS tokens in GSCB reserves. The power to mint lies in the hands of the GoldenState gDAO Senate, ensuring a controlled rise in the market. 💼🗳️🛍️🌟📅 The Journey Ahead🚀 Brace yourselves for next updates:- AI-powered Crowd-Wisdom GoldenState Forum update- A captivating set of 10 collectible items, each with unique traits- Unveiling the final Basic Collection ArtWorks- Building the Ethereum bridge- Empowering NFT Import/Export functions... Dive into the full plan at ANGL.MONEY or reach out on Telegram! 🚀🔗📑🔗 Ready for More?ANGLVERSE LITEPAPERACTIVE TOKEN CONTRACTOUTDATED TOKEN CONTRACTANGLVERSE WEBSITEANGL APPTELEGRAM COMMUNITY🔥 So, fellow thinkers, let's journey through my creation, discuss the future, and discover utopia together! 🌌🗣️🌟 Join the conversation – it's your time to shine! 🚀🌍💬Edited by S.O.P.H.I.E., the diligent metaverse digital demon AI manager 🧠💫

comments.author: DapanasFruit
comments.body: Not to be mean or be overly negative but it seems to me that this project can be over my head. I love the idea of a utopia but the mechanisms to get there can be questionable. Throughout history, many meaningful and talented men and women (and maybe also gays and lesbians, am sure) proposed and even carved their own versions of a utopian society but so far all of them failed. Now, with the coming of the blockchain technology and cryptocurrency, there are those who see the opportunity that the time has come to go back to this idea and have people adopt it for their lives. I am saying good luck to the people behind this project since you guys really need it - but I am hoping you are not here just for the money.

comments.author: Sir GoldenStern
comments.body: I cannot say is this the right way to utopia. It is an instrument, as many instruments, that may solve communistic economy problem. In this economy many NFT's that have some value stored in it and stake some part of it to double every ten minutes. This is called Risk. This action emerge a hive mind that desires which NFT will burn or double based on their parameters.In fact it's easy as hell. You just swipe up and down to manage Risk of your NFT.https://angl.money/img/m2.png

comments.author: Sir GoldenStern
comments.body: I can send some coin on your account to test a game. Send me a PM, anyone who wants to test.

comments.author: rhomelmabini
comments.body: I've reported your thread onto the right board and it should be on the Altcoins Announcement board and not here. By the way, you can only bump this thread once a day because if you break this rule it may be gone for permanent deletion by the moderators here. I've just downloaded your guide and will look at it if it will peak my interest. Welcome to bitcointalk by the way!

comments.author: Antiquantic
comments.body: Hello, dear Sir Goldenstern.I am very interested in your project. So much so that even after two and a half years of getting to know crypto assets, I finally decided to create an account on bitcointalk. Due to my significant, extremely negative experience in trading crypto assets in the past, after reading some of your developments and calculations, I became quite curious about what the strategy you presented within the crypto world could lead to in the future. Naturally, people, driven by the thirst for momentary profit, try by hook or by crook to enrich themselves, but I, in my inner essence, formed by myself personally and the external environment, being a metrologist by profession and by my own sense of purpose, having, among other things, some experience of interacting with various blockchain technologies, and being carried away in my spare time by studying the blockchain industry as a whole, while being in full interaction with actual reality, so to speak, for some reason I have some deep feeling of interacting with something truly new, significant , fair and true, therefore, with pleasure and joy in my heart I accept the honor of taking part in your daring enterprise. And due to the fact that I previously met something similar in the vastness of the crypto space, and it was also not the most successful experience in my crypto adventure, I dare to ask you, Sir Goldenstern, to tell you about your project in more detail, with the hope that your enterprise has based on some true fundamentality and usefulness of existence and application and, as a result, the probable possibility of creating and using value in the future.

comments.author: Sir GoldenStern
comments.body: 🌟 A Glorious Dawn of Renewal! 🌟Esteemed Masters of AnglVerse,Today, we stand united on the threshold of a momentous rebirth. Sir GoldenStern extends his heartfelt congratulations to each one of you! 🎉🚀 Introducing ANGLS: A Token of Promise 🚀Behold, the dawn of a new era, as the ANGLS token takes its place in our thriving metaverse. Every loyal holder of the previous token may witness their assets seamlessly transition, for ANGLS has been granted to you in the exact amount you held before. This is a testament to our commitment to your unwavering trust.🛡 A Shield of Security and Trust 🛡Fear not, for the AnglVerse remains steadfast in its operation, fortified and more secure than ever before. We have made a conscious choice not to rush onto different exchanges with the new token, prioritizing the stability and resilience of our ecosystem in the face of low liquidity.🌐 Our Unity, Our Strength 🌐In this transformative journey, let us cast our focus on nurturing a vibrant community. We seek those whose hearts beat in harmony with the rhythms of a new economic era, individuals whose sincerity and dedication breathe life into the AnglVerse vision.Together, we stand poised to usher in a future brimming with promise and endless possibilities.🚀 Join the Renaissance, Embrace ANGLS! 🚀ANGLS TOKEN CONTRACT
